original_title: Democracy in the Workplace: All About Collectives
overview: Three worker-owned businesses show what it's like to work collectively, manage a business and deal with problems in a truly democratic way.  The Cheeseboard Bakery and Cheese Shop with 18 workers, Rainbow Grocery with 150 workers, and Inkworks Press with18 members, all located in the San Francisco Bay Area, are successful worker-owned businesses, and members of NoBAWC.
title: Democracy in the Workplace: All About Collectives
